DECLARATION OF MICHAEL P. KELLY
I, Michael P. Kelly, declare as follows:
1.
I am an attorney duly licensed to practice law in the Commonwealth of
Pennsylvania and I represent Plaintiff CardConnect, LLC. I have personal knowledge of the facts
stated herein and, if called upon to do so, could and would competently testify thereto.
2.
Attached hereto as Exhibit A is a true and correct copy of pages 48-58 of the
transcript of excerpts of the March 22, 2022, deposition of Shift4 Payments, LLC taken pursuant to
Fed. R. Civ. P. 30(b)(6), along with the copy of Deposition Exhibit 9 referenced therein.
3.
Attached hereto as Exhibit B is a true and correct copy of a subpoena served on
Capital One Bank along with a copy of the cover sheet to the responsive document production that
indicates the Bates range of the documents. I have redacted account numbers from financial
statements referenced therein.
4.
Attached hereto as Exhibit C is a true and correct copy of an email chain produced
by Defendants in this action.
I declare and verify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America
and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania that the foregoing is true and correct:
